holidays.title: National Ice Cream Sandwich Day
holidays.description: It's a simple thing, really, but oh, what deliciousness!

holidays.description: Indulge your sweet tooth and serve yourself a big slice of Braham pie today.

holidays.title: Mary Prince Day
holidays.description: Find out Mary Prince’s experiences as a female slave and how her book changed the world.

holidays.title: National CAD Day
holidays.description: Let’s find out the benefit of using computer-aided design over manual drawing.

holidays.title: National Coloring Book Day
holidays.description: Coloring is no longer just for kids. So break out those coloring books!

holidays.title: National Water Balloon Day
holidays.description: Fill 'em up and let 'em fly; today is the day water balloons color the sky.

holidays.title: Republic Day in North Macedonia
holidays.description: Stand in remembrance of the chain of events that allowed Macedonia to achieve independence.

holidays.title: Umuganura Day
holidays.description: Be ready to have fun and get into the harvest mood for Umuganura Day.

holidays.title: Virgin of Los Angeles Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate and honor La Negrita with the locals on the Virgin of Los Angeles Day.

holidays.title: Ayden Mekus’s Birthday
holidays.description: The young multi-talented star is taking social media, and Hollywood, by storm.

holidays.title: Charli XCX’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented star loves making pop rock music and enjoys outdoor activities.

holidays.title: James Baldwin’s Birthday
holidays.description: His voice has made a significant difference to social issues and injustices that affect the world.

holidays.title: Kris Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's get to know the famous artist in a bit more detail.

holidays.title: Mark Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: This K-pop star has melted our hearts since his rise to stardom, and we love it!

holidays.title: Ola Aphrodite’s Birthday
holidays.description: It's time to celebrate the stylish, beautiful, and brilliant cosplay model on her birthday.

holidays.title: Tiana Small’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality television star gave us something to talk about while she was in the limelight!
